title: Rolling power cuts of over 3 hours tomorrow?
body_lines: The Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) has made a request to the Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) to impose power interruptions of 3 hours and 45 minutes tomorrow (March 10) as well, sources told Ada Derana.
Thereby, the interruptions to the electricity supply are expected between 8.00 a.m. and 11.00 p.m.
